闠字的基本解释

闠
huì
见“阓”。

闠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
［《廣韻》胡對切，去隊，匣。］
“阓1”的繁体字。
(1)市区的门。后亦借指市区。
(2)通“鞼”。绣革。

闠字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　闠； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1342第04
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?胡對切，音潰。【說文】市外門也。【廣韻】闤闠，市門。【張衡·西京賦】通闤帶闠。【註】市門曰闠。　又道也。【博雅】闤闠，道也。　又【集韻】求位切，音匱。義同。

闠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
闠字的起名意思

暂无。

Shun
Basic explanation of words
Shun
huì
See "Tang".
Shun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huì］
["Guangyun" Hu cuts, goes to the team, box. ]
"阓1" in traditional characters.
(1) The gate of the urban area. Later also refers to the urban area.
(2) Through "鞼". Embroidered leather.
Shun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xuji 1] [Door Character Department] 　阓; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1342 04
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Hu cut, sound collapsed. [Said the text] Outer door of the city. [Guang Yun] Shun, the gate of the city. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Tongyu with a cast. [Note] The gate of the city is called 阓.　It's also said. [Bo Ya] Shun, Dao.　[Jiyun] Seek position, lack of sound. The same meaning.
